data.text: Dawudaa bɛtina, bɛti baane kuntigin xa. Sigi sariɲanxina.
Ala xa keli,
E kedi,
Koni tinxin muxune xa ɲaxan,
Bɛtin ba Ala xa,
Ala naxan a kon sariɲanxini,
Ala denbayaan fima denbayatarene ma,
Ala, i to ti i ya yamaan yɛɛ ra,
Bɔxɔn yi xuruxurun,
Ala, i tule gbeen nafa nɛn,
I ya yamaan yi dɔxɔ na,
Marigin bata feni ito xibarun fi,
“Mangane nun sofane e gima!
Ɛ tan naxanye fan luxi xuruseene dɛxɔn,
Ala Sɛnbɛ Kanna to na mangane raxuya ayi,
Basan yamanan geyane gbo!
Nanfera ɛ Alaa geya sugandixin matoma xɔxɔlɔnni,
Marigin bata fa a yire sariɲanxini
Marigina Alatala, i bata te kore,
Barikan xa bira Marigin xa lɔxɔ yo lɔxɔ,
En ma Ala, Ala na a ra
Ala yatina a yaxune xunne yibɔma nɛn
Marigin bata a fala, a naxa,
alogo ɛ xa ɛ sanne sin e wunli
Ala, nxu bata i ya yamaan famatɔɔn to.
Bɛti baane yɛɛn na,
Barikan bira Ala xa a malan gbeeni.
Bunyamin bɔnsɔnna,
Ala, i sɛnbɛn nagodo,
I Batu Banxin Yerusalɛn taani,
I xa falan ti Misiran bɔxɔn xili ma
Xɛrane kelima nɛn Misiran yamanani,
Dunuɲa yamanane,
A masiga tima kore xɔnna ma
Ɛ Ala sɛnbɛna fe rali,
Ala na mini a Yire Sariɲanxini,
